bibl.title: The Comic Fragment in PSI 1175: Commentary and Literary Motifs.
bibl.note: P.S.I. X, 1175 (= Pack2 1640). - I. Text and commentary. - II. Literary motifs: Phrasing and style; Form; Content: travesty of myth and of mythological figures; Subject-matter: theogonic burlesque.
